document.full_text: the oil-rich governments of sudan and angola are among the worst in africa for looking after children, while poorer tanzania, mozambique and niger are the best, a study showed on tuesday.
document.title: poorer african states put children first: study
lines_and_colors: the oil-rich governments of sudan and angola are among the worst in africa for looking after children, while poorer tanzania, mozambique and niger are the best, a study showed on tuesday.
